name: Another Boring Sack Of Shit (a boring sack of shit 2)

description:
Another Boring Sack Of Shit (a boring sack of shit 2) is a game developed by Nintendo Scratch. It was originally released in 2022.
Another Boring Sack Of Shit (a boring sack of shit 2) is available on Web. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
